name: MTLCommonCounterSet
desc: Options for specifying which GPU counter set you want to sample.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a common counter set from a raw value.

items.name: static let timestamp: MTLCommonCounterSet
items.desc: A counter set that measures GPU timestamps at different points in the pipeline.

items.name: static let stageUtilization: MTLCommonCounterSet
items.desc: A counter set that measures hardware utilization as a measure of cycles spent in different stages.

items.name: static let statistic: MTLCommonCounterSet
items.desc: A counter set that measures workload processing statistics throughout pipeline stages.
